story_seed.title: The Seeker's Journey

protagonist.goal: To understand a complex philosophical concept

setting.secondary: Encounters with diverse individuals and communities

central_concept.name: multiplicity - Jainism
central_concept.description: A concept that proposes a new way of viewing reality

themes: The nature of truth and reality
Personal growth through intellectual and spiritual challenges
The impact of ideas on personal relationships and society
plot_elements: Encounters with mentors representing different schools of thought
Application of the central concept to real-world dilemmas
Internal struggles as the protagonist's beliefs are challenged
A climactic event that tests the protagonist's understanding
Resolution that explores the broader implications of the central concept
character_types: Those affected by the protagonist's journey and decisions

narrative_style.balance: Equal parts philosophical dialogue and character development
narrative_style.accessibility: Complex ideas presented in relatable, real-world contexts
